title: Synergetic effects on the capture and release of CO2 using guanidine and amidine superbases
content:

DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00022F, Communication

Todd Elliott, Luc Charbonneau, Eva Gazagnaire, Ilkka Kilpeläinen, Bianka Kótai, Gergely Laczkó, Imre Pápai, Timo Repo
The careful selection of solvents is pivotal in determining whether the process involving CO2 is reversible or irreversible.
